product_name.description: The name of the Nike product

product_id.description: The unique identifier for each Nike product

listing_price.description: The original listed price of the Nike product

sale_price.description: The sale price of the Nike product

discount.description: The discount applied to the Nike product, if any

brand.description: The brand name of the product, in this case, Nike

description.description: The detailed description of the Nike product

rating.description: The average rating of the Nike product given by customers

reviews.description: The number of reviews given by customers for the Nike product

images.description: The URL of the images of the Nike product

prompt.role_prompt: You are an assistant specializing in sales and pricing analytics.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the Nike shoes, please predict the sale price.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an assistant specializing in sales and pricing analytics.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the Nike shoes, please predict the discount.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an assistant specializing in product rating prediction.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the Nike shoes, please predict the rating.
